objective: Experienced Software Developer and Research Engineer with a background in Computer Science, specializing in back-end development, blockchain technologies, functional programming, formal verification, and technical writing. Seeking opportunities to apply my expertise in software development and research.

description: Strengthened OCaml programming expertise through intensive practice with algorithms and data structures
Developed various projects covering system programming, networking, and data structures
Enhanced testing practices using multiple OCaml testing frameworks
Focus on deepening fundamental computer science concepts and algorithms
Full-Stack Project Development with React, TypeScript, CSS, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL
Mobile application development with React Native Expo, Firebase, Google Cloud
Played a key role in Tezos Blockchain ecosystem (focus on Layer 2 solutions)
Collaborated with diverse teams, including testing, infrastructure, dApps, UX enhancements
Worked with Gitlab/GitHub CI/CD, wrote merge requests, reviewed merge requests
Worked in teams with different cultures and languages
Core developer for Tezos Blockchain pre-mainnet launch
Actively participated in technical training sessions and master classes
Contributed to protocol upgrades and core feature development
Improved security in Tezos projects through research project trying to integrate formal methods
Developed KaSa, a static analyzer for Kappa models, using OCaml
Focused on abstract interpretation tools for biochemical models

items: Programming Languages: OCaml, Coq, Functional Programming (Expert Level)
Rust, TypeScript, JavaScript, React Native Expo, Node.js, PostgreSQL (Intermediate Level)
Blockchain Technologies: Tezos Protocol, Layer 1/2 Solutions, Smart Contracts, dApps
Development Tools: Git, GitLab/GitHub CI/CD, Docker
Verification & Analysis: Formal Verification, Abstract Interpretation, Static Analysis
Software Engineering: Test-Driven Development, Code Review, Technical Documentation
Research: Academic Publishing, Technical Writing, Algorithm Design
